info.name: Thin Film Instability
info.description: Something you might expect to see on a bubble.

renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
#define R iResolution.xy
#define Main void mainImage(out vec4 Q, in vec2 U)
#define A(U) texture(iChannel0,(U)/R)
#define B(U) texture(iChannel1,(U)/R)
#define P .1/(1.+length(U-.5*R))
#define ei(a) mat2(cos(a),sin(a),-sin(a),cos(a))
renderpass.name: Common
Buffer A
Buffer B
Buffer C
Buffer D
